name: places/ChIJH-OLTppZwokRnKwT_6PqBMI
adrFormatAddress: 210 5th Ave, New York, NY 10010, USA

editorialSummary.text: Showroom and listening space for retailer of handcrafted, high-end audiophile components & speakers.

originalText.text: Contacted Audio Arts recently inquiring about a Linn Series 3 wireless speaker. Owner Gideon Schwarz could not have been more helpful. Not only did he promptly arrange a listening session of said speaker at his beautiful showroom in NYC, but he was able to procure and deliver it immediately, whereas most any other retailer would’ve taken months to do same. On top of that, Gideon navigated me towards a very significant turntable cartridge upgrade that has made a massive, massive difference in performance. Huge marks for these guys. Can’t wait to work with them on the next upgrade.

text.text: Contacted Audio Arts recently inquiring about a Linn Series 3 wireless speaker. Owner Gideon Schwarz could not have been more helpful. Not only did he promptly arrange a listening session of said speaker at his beautiful showroom in NYC, but he was able to procure and deliver it immediately, whereas most any other retailer would’ve taken months to do same. On top of that, Gideon navigated me towards a very significant turntable cartridge upgrade that has made a massive, massive difference in performance. Huge marks for these guys. Can’t wait to work with them on the next upgrade.

originalText.text: Audio Arts and Gideon Schwartz are consistent in providing the customer with the knowledge and sanguine advice that brings them toward their goal of listening nirvana.  Not only is Gideon very approachable, he truly cares about your well being.  He would rather not sell you something unless he knows that you are happy, and have an understanding of what you want.  The thing that I find interesting about Audio Arts is that not only do they carry brands and items that I never even knew existed, but even if I did, I would have no idea how to procure them.  Gideon is right on the ball with that due to his connections and  stature in the Audio Community.

Not only is Gideon very approachable, he truly cares about your well being.  He would rather not sell you something unless he knows that you are happy, and have an understanding of what you want. originalText.text: This is a music lover's dream come true. A true audiophile gem. Gideon is an eclectic music lover and his knowledge of both the music and the high-end audio equipment he represents is superb. Gideon keeps his beautifully appointed salon an easy-going place, approachable and relaxed, where music happens. The high-end products and systems that he represents are hand-picked by him from his years of experience. I have spent many a happy hour auditioning products at Audioarts and have made a significant purchase from Gideon for my reference high end audio system, from Ensemble. I could not be happier with my investment in the music, guided by Audioarts. Highly recommended for the music lover and true audiophile looking to get closer to the music!

originalText.text: Audioarts owner, Gideon Schwartz introduced me to a listening experience that was unique in its ability to emotionally connect me to the music.The artifice of hi-fi just melted away and only music remained. Gideon cares deeply about helping you make that connection and is patient and generous with his time and knowledge.As a long suffering audiophile my visit to Gideon’s studio was educational and nothing short of a revelation.

text.text: Audioarts owner, Gideon Schwartz introduced me to a listening experience that was unique in its ability to emotionally connect me to the music.The artifice of hi-fi just melted away and only music remained. Gideon cares deeply about helping you make that connection and is patient and generous with his time and knowledge.As a long suffering audiophile my visit to Gideon’s studio was educational and nothing short of a revelation.

originalText.text: Gideon has a terrific ability to find unique audio items that, simply put, enhance the quality of your life at a price point that will work. Just as importantly, he remains available for the inevitable little things that need personal attention. He loves what he does and the result is greatly enhanced musical joy
